cmb:
MANA COST: 75/80/85/90
COOLDOWN: 11
desc: Throws down a smoke bomb, silencing and slowing enemy units in an area while causing them to miss on most attacks.  Lasts 6 seconds.
notes: Doesn't prevent the use of active items.
lore: Since his escape during the night of his betrayal, Riki has valued the use of a simple smoke screen to confuse his opponents.
name: riki_smoke_screen

attrib:
FADE DELAY: 8 / 6 / 4 / 2
INVISIBILITY HP REGEN: 4 / 5 / 6 / 7
desc: Riki fades into the shadows, staying permanently invisible except while attacking.  While silenced, Riki will be visible.
notes:
Riki won't auto attack enemies while invisible.
Silence disables this ability.
name: riki_permanent_invisibility

desc: If Riki attacks from behind, bonus damage is applied based on his current agility.
notes:
Illusions of Riki will play Backstab animations, but not deal any bonus damage.
Bonus damage from Backstab can't be evaded.
lore: The Stealth Assassin is not afraid to fight dirty, and specializes in attacking his opponents from behind.
name: riki_backstab

attrib:
RANGE: 800
NUMBER OF CHARGES: 4 / 5 / 6
CHARGE RESTORE TIME: 35
cmb: MANA COST: 40
desc: Teleports behind the target unit, striking for bonus damage if it is an enemy.
notes:
Riki's first attack after Blink Strike will be a backstab.
Blink Strike's damage is dealt before the next attack.
You can Blink Strike to allies, but no damage is dealt.
lore: The Stealth Assassin's agile movement makes him impossible to escape.
name: riki_blink_strike
